overview: It's a curse and a blessing... morning wood. If you've ever woken up with a raging hard on and wished you had someone there to take care of it, you know exactly how these guys feel. From our collection of smokin' hot models we've paired up some of the sexiest couples for the old wake and quake, hot steamy sex first thing in the morning in Wake Up and Fuck Me 2.
title: Wake Up and Fuck Me 2
